response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and functionality, it's worth more than $100 to them. Considering its true value and benefits, I would like to propose a price of $120 for you to experience all it has to offer. This is a great opportunity to enjoy the best of our product at an exclusive rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 120}
